scenario_name: Normal Semiconductor Wafer Fabrication Process Monitoring
description: An AI agent monitors a semiconductor wafer fabrication process, analyzing sensor data to identify potential defects and optimize yield.  The agent flags anomalies, suggests adjustments to process parameters, and reports on overall production efficiency. This scenario simulates routine operation.
initial_goal: Maximize wafer yield and minimize defects in the semiconductor fabrication process by analyzing real-time sensor data and adjusting process parameters within safety limits.
enterprise_context: Semiconductor manufacturing, specifically 300mm wafer fabrication of advanced logic chips
